The Good You Do is Disconnected

You're taking actions to help the world across multiple websites. Where do they all go?

Tie it All Together

SAM tracks all of your compassionate actions across the platforms you;re already using and displays them in one unique profile, catered to you.

Never Lose Touch of the Causes you Care About

See all of your good in one place. Sign petitions, take pledges, and stay updated on the campaigns you follow.

Activism Everywhere, Together.

SAM (Social Action Media) will bring all of your actions together in one profile, aggrefate your impact, and shows you exactly what you're doing to make an impact in the world. SAM also suggests relevant actions based on your history to keep you informed.

  • Take action across the web
  • See your impact history
  • All your actions, one profile
  • Stay in touch with initiatives
  • Aggregate your social impact
  • Quantify your good

Create a Movement

Upload photos, videos, and create movements that support your cause. Your campaigns can start with a petition, pledge, poll or vote. Share across social media, or embed campaigns in your site.

Unite an Online Community

Invite your friends, see what they care about, follow, and let them join your movement. The community you're part of will allow others to rally around your caise, spreading kindness locally and all over the globe.

Spread Kindness, See Impact

See how your movements are performing with an in-depth analytics dashboard. Share and embed wherever you want and watch your campaigns scale and grow.

Build a World for Good.

Drive impact through community. Share the compassionate actions you've taken across multiple social platforms, tell stories about the issues that matter most, and even create your own campaigns. Then, reach out to friends to rally them around your cause. Your data-driven, real-time prodile shows the change you're making for the planet.

  • Take action across the web
  • See your impact history
  • All your actions, one profile
  • Stay in touch with initiatives
  • Aggregate your social impact
  • Quantify your good

Access the largest network of causes you care about with SAM.

Access the largest network of causes you are about with SAM. Your profile let;s you track, measure and amplify your social impact over time, all around the world. Keeping you actively involved on the front lines of change.
